info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 01 at 3:14PM PDT until September 01 at 4:45PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... Central Clark County in southern Nevada... * Until 445 PM PDT. * At 314 PM PDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Up to 1.75 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar and automated gauges. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Henderson, Southern Highlands, Enterprise, Anthem, Paradise, Green Valley, Sloan, Seven Hills, Silverado Ranch and Henderson Executive Airport. This includes the following roads... Interstate 15 in Nevada between mile markers 16 and 25. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR AND GAUGE INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
